channel.title: How to get my client.jar to my website?
channel.description:
I uploaded my client.jar to webhost called "x10Hosting" but now I want to add that client to internet. I added this to my website.. im using stupid weebly.com free website maker.. lol And when I put that html code to my website, client starts loading but then it gives error, because it doesnt find the client.jar. [B]Could someone tell me how to make website for my client.jar? [/B] [CODE] CLIENT

NOTE: bla!!
bla.. [/CODE] If someone tells me how to do that i'll be very thankful! :D Add My MSN: [email]TribaleD@live.com[/email] or explain it here.

use ucoz.com, free direct link hosting, and i think 400mb max so your good.
